title: mdshimom80
author: mdshimom80
created_time: February 13, 2023, 06:46:22 AMLast edit: April 17, 2023, 05:28:04 AM by mdshimom80

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: I am not saying that OP is going to steal your personal information but just a reminder for everyone that might want to take the OP's offer that you are giving important personal information to someone who you don't know. the chance of your personal information being used on other things is high. if I were you, I would ignore this offer.

comments.author: hopenotlate
comments.body: Agree with acroman08 not to mess with personal ID online, you can find yourself in big troubles just for some bucks : there are some red flags here warning everyone, able to seethem, to stay away from this. But what concernes me most s the massages thing  Quote from: mdshimom80 on February 13, 2023, 06:46:22 AMYou can massage me anytime.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: hopenotlate on February 13, 2023, 07:16:38 AMAgree with acroman08 not to mess with personal ID online, you can find yourself in big troubles just for some bucks : there are some red flags here warning everyone, able to seethem, to stay away from this. But what concernes me most s the massages thing  Quote from: mdshimom80 on February 13, 2023, 06:46:22 AMYou can massage me anytime.When it comes to telegram deals you all have to be careful and never to trust a stranger with your money, once you send a transaction via blockchain it can't be reversed,  and be careful with you privacy and don't expose your password and other security information to anyone. - Buying and selling of accounts is not advisable since you don't know the intention of the other party. -Those account can be used to commit crimes and if it run into troubles, it will still be trace back to you. -beware be warn and stay safe.

comments.author: gunhell16
comments.body: Quote from: mdshimom80 on February 13, 2023, 07:07:17 AMQuote from: acroman08 on February 13, 2023, 06:55:09 AMI am not saying that OP is going to steal your personal information but just a reminder for everyone that might want to take the OP's offer that you are giving important personal information to someone who you don't know. the chance of your personal information being used on other things is high. if I were you, I would ignore this offer.sir i know its look like not good to trust anyone. but im serious for this. i will just want to buy those id that people used for bet but they lost a lot of money. now they dont bet. you dont need to give me your information or personal data. if you have lose account just show me proof. if you are also trusty person i can pay you 20% to 30% advance. I bought many accounts.In order not to suspect or think badly of you, imagine that you are looking for an account in 1xbit that you want to buy and that you should be able to see its sensitive information.Did you know that the 1xbit gambling platform here on this forum is a scam that many people complained about on that platform that was never resolved and ended up taking the money of their players after depositing a lot of money?What will you do with the account you buy? will you play gambling at 1xbit? if yes, just create your account, not the one who will use another account to create an account there.

comments.author: Broadanbig
comments.body: Quote from: mdshimom80 on February 13, 2023, 06:46:22 AMI buy 1xbit loss id. If you loss over 1000 dollar on id. you can contact me. my telegram id - @imsaimonConditions:1. First I check your Id.2. Your id must active. I will give you a good amount. You can massage me anytime.If everything ok we can make a good deal.OP I don't think that can be achieved here. As you can see for yourself  here https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=3906360.220 1xbit already flagged a a scam project and promoters of the 1xbit campaign all flagged as well. Virtually every one on this platform knows about them and complaints coming in about them scamming their registered members. After all these said, what are you doing with loss account as stated by you, you requesting for an ID at first does not conote any good sign. If someone should give you their ID without having any details about you what is the possibility that their ID would still remain private?You did not mention escrow which would have been better if you requested for an ID for which I think you could get possible turn up but I think your chance of getting one here is minuit as no one would want to deal or getting involved with 1xbit.

comments.author: EarnOnVictor
comments.body: I must say that there is no offer we will not see here, buying an ID is not encouraging to me, and why would someone want to buy a lost ID? This is raising my curiosity about how desperate some people could be for their personal gain.Wait a minute, is it possible you lose your ID with a custodial company and are not able to retrieve it back? Why are they custodial? I don't get it. Well, this offer seems like a cruise to me, even though the company mentioned is such with questionable service.

comments.author: Baofeng
comments.body: Quote from: Broadanbig on February 13, 2023, 07:40:36 AMQuote from: mdshimom80 on February 13, 2023, 06:46:22 AMI buy 1xbit loss id. If you loss over 1000 dollar on id. you can contact me. my telegram id - @imsaimonConditions:1. First I check your Id.2. Your id must active. I will give you a good amount. You can massage me anytime.If everything ok we can make a good deal.OP I don't think that can be achieved here. As you can see for yourself  here https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=3906360.220 1xbit already flagged a a scam project and promoters of the 1xbit campaign all flagged as well. Virtually every one on this platform knows about them and complaints coming in about them scamming their registered members. After all these said, what are you doing with loss account as stated by you, you requesting for an ID at first does not conote any good sign. If someone should give you their ID without having any details about you what is the possibility that their ID would still remain private?You did not mention escrow which would have been better if you requested for an ID for which I think you could get possible turn up but I think your chance of getting one here is minuit as no one would want to deal or getting involved with 1xbit.I think the question is why is the OP insisting on playing on 1xbit when it's obvious that the casino has a lot of issues?Quote from: mdshimom80 on February 13, 2023, 07:24:50 AMsir i just want to buy 1xbit minus losses id so i can bet on 1xbit big amount. if you know about 1xbit. they suspend big amount player id after 1 or 2 bet. they dont want us to make profit. but minus and losses id can make more bets. they dont ban instantly. I never force someone to sell me or contact me. Its just post that i want to buy. If anyone interested i can buy.Lol, then what's going to happen if those accounts won big?You said that they are going to suspend if you make huge profit, then how can you withdraw or make money from it? What if they flagged your account becasue you are making big amount?I really don't understand the reasoning here by the OP. In any case, good luck on your strategy.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: Broadanbig on February 13, 2023, 07:40:36 AMQuote from: mdshimom80 on February 13, 2023, 06:46:22 AMI buy 1xbit loss id. If you loss over 1000 dollar on id. you can contact me. my telegram id - @imsaimonConditions:1. First I check your Id.2. Your id must active. I will give you a good amount. You can massage me anytime.If everything ok we can make a good deal.OP I don't think that can be achieved here. As you can see for yourself  here https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=3906360.220 1xbit already flagged a a scam project and promoters of the 1xbit campaign all flagged as well. Virtually everyone on this platform knows about them and complaints coming in about them scamming their registered members. After all, these said, what are you doing with the loss account as stated by you, your request for an ID at first does not connote any good sign. If someone should give you their ID without having any details about you what is the possibility that their ID would still remain private?You did not mention escrow which would have been better if you requested for an ID for which I think you could get a possible turn up but I think your chance of getting one here is minuit as no one would want to deal or get involved with 1xbit.The fact that ops are opting for 1xbit accounts is suspicious enough and is enough red flag, and looking for such an account that has wagered such a high amount of losses in those accounts will not be an easy task here in the forum, since 1xbit has already been flagged in this forum for a long time now and at that, members of this forum are warned to stay off from 1xbit casino so no one will wager such amount with all the warning here around the forum. -That being said, I think ops also need to make clarification of what his motive is for buying those accounts and what he wants to use the accounts for and I bet he can look elsewhere not here.

comments.author: hopenotlate
comments.body: Quote from: mdshimom80 on February 13, 2023, 07:24:50 AMQuote from: hopenotlate on February 13, 2023, 07:16:38 AMAgree with acroman08 not to mess with personal ID online, you can find yourself in big troubles just for some bucks : there are some red flags here warning everyone, able to seethem, to stay away from this. But what concernes me most s the massages thing  Quote from: mdshimom80 on February 13, 2023, 06:46:22 AMYou can massage me anytime.-snip - if you know about 1xbit.-snipYes I know about them, do you?Check also 1xbit_official account than I cannot screenshot or their red trust will takes two pages of this thread.If you are genuinely interested in betting big amounts there are way better alternatives out there allowing you to wager huge amounts : just browse gambling section here and have a look at sites trust score before putting your money in.Also there are also projects like wagerr.com that, despite not having a huge variety of betting offers, give you the possibility to bet on basically most popular events and matches without any limits, frome everywhere you live in the world, without KYCing you ever, ina decentralized manner and everything in trasparency because everything in tracked on wagerr blockchain

comments.author: usekevin
comments.created_time: February 13, 2023, 08:36:00 AMLast edit: February 13, 2023, 08:53:38 AM by usekevin
comments.body: The transaction without escrow is not highly recommended one for the deal.Secondly it's 1xbit account, which is the scam website of the forum. Mostly people who are engaged in the trade of 1xbit will not engaged here.When we look of buyer profile it's newbie and he asking the details upfront is not a good one for the seller at any extreme.After you give password, they ask you the mail access for the 1xbit account.So after getting full access, they will do block of your telegram account.This will not have the good way of deal anything.Hire the good escrow to deal was recommended one for the sellers.

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: Quote from: Wiwo on February 13, 2023, 07:26:00 AMQuote from: hopenotlate on February 13, 2023, 07:16:38 AMAgree with acroman08 not to mess with personal ID online, you can find yourself in big troubles just for some bucks : there are some red flags here warning everyone, able to seethem, to stay away from this. Well, telegram itself is fraught with many dangers due to the influx of scammers, especially to make deals with strangers who are not in your personal contacts is extremely reckless and risky, so stay away from such offers.
